name: Freshdesk New Tickets
description: Be the best customer support team you can be! Add a list of your latest Freshdesk tickets to your dashboard, and track their status and priority levels. Originates from the Gallery.

zapier-01.name: Freshdesk Tickets via Zapier
zapier-01.description: Use Zapier to get your latest slack messages. Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.description:
This Klip relies on Zapier to update the data source. After adding the Klip you will need to setup this Zap

Note: When you first add this Klip data will not be shown because the data source is empty. The data begins accumulating once you setup the Zap and includes all new tickets that are added after that.
